description: Detects a "regsvr32" execution where the DLL doesn't contain a common file extension.
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
false_positives: Other legitimate extensions currently not in the list either from third party or specific Windows components.
name: Regsvr32 DLL Execution With Uncommon Extension
query: ((((process.executable.text:"*\\regsvr32.exe") OR (winlog.event_data.OriginalFileName:"REGSVR32.EXE")) AND (NOT ((process.command_line.text:("*.ax*" OR "*.cpl*" OR "*.dll*" OR "*.ocx*")) OR (NOT _exists_:process.command_line.text) OR (process.command_line.text:"")))) AND (NOT ((process.command_line.text:"*.ppl*") OR (process.command_line.text:"*.bav*"))))
